++ Git Command Push

+++ SUMMARY

  * publishes new changes (commits on your local server)
    * publishes to a remote branch that has tracking relationship with whatever branch youre on when you push. 

  * Can also publish new local branches to the remote
    * -u argument to GitCommandPush can be helpful: Ensures GitTrackingConnection
